original_text:
Many have become my enemies without cause;
    those who hate me without reason are numerous.
korean_text: 내 원수가 활발하며 강하고 부당하게 나를 미워하는 자가 많으며

sentences.original_text: Many have become my enemies without cause
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람들이 까닭 없이 나의 원수가 되었고

sentences.original_text: those who hate me without reason
